Package chess

Class Chess

java.lang.Object
chess.Chess
public class Chess
extends java.lang.Object
Initiates and orchestrates the game of Chess in the main method. Houses functionality to request, pre-process and store user input.
Author:
Patrick Barry, Philip Murray

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    (package private) static class  Chess.Input
    Class that stores chess input.

  • Field Details

    • turn

      static int turn
      Represents whose turn it is to make a movement. (0: white, 1: black) of the Queen

    • gameItteration

      public static int gameItteration
      Stores the amount of turns which have occurred

    • drawRequest

      static boolean drawRequest
      Stores whether a draw was previously requested.

    • drawItt

      public static int drawItt
      Stores the gameItteration of the last draw request.

    • CurrentBoard

      public static Board CurrentBoard
      Stores the game's chess Board

  • Constructor Details

    • Chess

      public Chess()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main Method for generating chess Board and running chess match. Iterates over the range of turns which will occur, making requests for input, requesting pieces to be moved, calling the Board to be rendered, and declaring game states.
      Parameters:
      args - Not used

    • charToInt

      public static int charToInt​(char c)
      Takes in a user-input char and converts char to a Rank (jth or x-position) on the board
      Parameters:
      c - Character input of Rank
      Returns:
      i jth or x-position on board for legal move. -1 for Illegal move.

    • askForInput

      public static void askForInput() throws IllegalMoveException
      Takes in user input for moving pieces with or without promotion, requesting a draw, declaring a draw, and resigning
      Throws:
      IllegalMoveException - Stating draw none was requested by opposing team
      IllegalMoveException - Piece at initial provided position is null
      IllegalMoveException - Piece at initial provided position is not on side of player
      IllegalMoveException - Cannot request promotion if black isn't moving to x1
      IllegalMoveException - Cannot request promotion if white isn't moving to x8

    • charToPiece

      public static Piece charToPiece​(char s)
      Maps an user-inputted char parameter to create a piece for promotion.
      Parameters:
      s - char input for new promoted piece.
      Returns:
      new Piece depending on char input.

    • clearInput

      public static void clearInput()
      Sets starting position, ending positions, and promotion to 0 and null respectively. Called before asking for input to clear data from previous input request.
